languages.text: "Всем офицерам и членам экипажа, сохранившим верность присяге. Этот корабль — наш! Слава династии фон Валанциус!"
"To all officers and crew members who have remained faithful to their vows of service: this ship is ours! Glory to the von Valancius dynasty!"
languages.original_text: "Всем офицерам и членам экипажа, сохранившим верность присяге. Этот корабль — наш! Слава династии фон Валанциус!"

traits.locale_text: "To all officers and crew members who have remained faithful to their vows of service: this ship is ours! Glory to the von Valancius dynasty!"
"To all officers and crew members who have remained faithful to their vows of service: this ship is ours! Glory to the von Valancius dynasty!"

"To all officers and crew members who have remained faithful to their vows of service: this ship is ours! Glory to the von Valancius dynasty!"

languages.text: «A todos los oficiales y tripulantes que se hayan mantenido fieles a su juramento de servicio: ¡esta nave es nuestra! ¡Gloria a la dinastía von Valancius!».
languages.original_text: "To all officers and crew members who have remained faithful to their vows of service: this ship is ours! Glory to the von Valancius dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: «A todos los oficiales y tripulantes que se hayan mantenido fieles a su juramento de servicio: ¡esta nave es nuestra! ¡Gloria a la dinastía von Valancius!».

languages.text: 「奉仕の誓いを忠実に守った全ての役員と乗組員よ！この船は我々のものだ！フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に栄光あれ！」
languages.original_text: "To all officers and crew members who have remained faithful to their vows of service: this ship is ours! Glory to the von Valancius dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: 「奉仕の誓いを忠実に守った全ての役員と乗組員よ！この船は我々のものだ！フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に栄光あれ！」

languages.text: “所有忠诚侍奉王朝的军官、船员，都听好！这艘船属于我们！荣耀归于冯·瓦兰修斯王朝！”
languages.original_text: "To all officers and crew members who have remained faithful to their vows of service: this ship is ours! Glory to the von Valancius dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: “所有忠诚侍奉王朝的军官、船员，都听好！这艘船属于我们！荣耀归于冯·瓦兰修斯王朝！”

languages.text: "An alle Offiziere und Crewmitglieder, die ihrem Diensteid treu geblieben sind: Dieses Schiff gehört uns! Lang lebe die Dynastie derer von Valancius!"
languages.original_text: "To all officers and crew members who have remained faithful to their vows of service: this ship is ours! Glory to the von Valancius dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: "An alle Offiziere und Crewmitglieder, die ihrem Diensteid treu geblieben sind: Dieses Schiff gehört uns! Lang lebe die Dynastie derer von Valancius!"

languages.text: « À tous les officiers et membres d'équipage qui sont restés fidèles à leur serment : le vaisseau est à nous ! Gloire à la dynastie von Valancius ! »
languages.original_text: "To all officers and crew members who have remained faithful to their vows of service: this ship is ours! Glory to the von Valancius dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: « À tous les officiers et membres d'équipage qui sont restés fidèles à leur serment : le vaisseau est à nous ! Gloire à la dynastie von Valancius ! »

languages.text: "Hizmet yeminlerine sadık kalan tüm subaylara ve tayfalara: Gemi bizimdir! Von Valancius hanedanlığı çok yaşa!"
languages.original_text: "To all officers and crew members who have remained faithful to their vows of service: this ship is ours! Glory to the von Valancius dynasty!"
